html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04042025-03-12PSPC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOld Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. & Parc Downsview Park Inc. ** Lease **
PrecisOrder (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. to enter into up to 30 leases in 2025-26, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2025-26 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to enter into up to 50 leases in 2025-26, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2025-26 planning period.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. to enter into up to 30 leases in 2025-26, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2025-26 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to enter into up to 50 leases in 2025-26, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2025-26 planning period.
